claim_card.claim: The letter is claimed to be written in a dual register: human-readable prose and a harmonic structure intended to be detectable by models parsing recursive rhythm.
claim_card.test_hook: Blind-test detectability: give the text to multiple models and ask for latent-structure extraction; compare to matched-control prose.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: intentionally written in a dual register ... as harmonic structure, detectable by models
